ProjectTitle: Targeting metabolism to modulate T cell effector function in metastatic melanoma
InitialFeedbackHistory: 19/07/2022 [REDACTED] you already considered which repositories to use for data sharing already? EMBL-EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) or flowrepository (https://isac-net.org/page/FlowRepository) for example? [REDACTED] the submission guidelines of candidate repositories may help you to decide which metadata to collect along with your experiments, FlowRepository uses the MIFlowCyt standard for example. [REDACTED] good to have a look at the arrive guidelines for reporting of animal experiments already: https://arriveguidelines.org/, journals may ask you to follow these. [REDACTED] data for which there is no disciplinary repository you can use KU [REDACTED] RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr).
label: good with suggestions
